titles.title: New Mexico Rivers Feasibility Studies Act of 2006

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct feasibility studies to identify opportunities to increase the surface flows of the Rio Grande, Canadian, and Pecos Rivers in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/29/2006--Introduced. New Mexico Rivers Feasibility Studies Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Commissioner of Reclamation, to conduct feasibility studies to identify opportunities to increase the surface flows of the Rio Grande, Canadian, and Pecos Rivers in New Mexico.
